    About Me

    Photo credit: DataKind

    I created this site to showcase and share some of the cool stuff I am doing with data.
    I write blog posts to demo tools and approaches I am developing.
    My portfolio includes my recent projects and some background info about me

    About

    Experienced Manager

    I have lead high performance data teams supporting major change initiatives since 2015. I am immensely proud of the amazing work we have delivered and our collaborative culture.

    Skilled Data Analyst

    Over a decade of experience of working with customers to understand their data. Successfully lead on moving from legacy reporting to utilizing modern and scalable tools like Power BI.

    Developing Data Scientist

    In the past few years I have been expanding my use of Python in particular for Text Analysis and Web Scraping.

    My Latest Projects

    Python Text Analysis in Power BI

    In this project I have adapted core Python text analytics tools to extract key information and sentiment within the Power BI data import processes.
    The aim was to develop generalized versions of the code that can easily be adapted for a variety of text sources.
    Using Power BI to extract, Python to transform, then Power BI to load and present the data means that any data analyst can use powerful data science tools.

    Read More

    Advanced Power BI Visuals

    In this project I have presented examples of customizable visual tools and how to adapt them to fit your needs.
    In one example I have brought together guides and tools to create custom shape maps adapted from the ones produced by the office of national statistics(ONS).
    Another example brings together guides for the Infographic Designer custom visual and looks at a few custom ideas that I have produced using the tool.
